title: (x) House/Revenge - Futura/Eckmann {James, Yves}
content:
hello everyone , whats the name of the house text font?,and the name of the revenge font and where do i purchase thanks for your help!

revenge font

comments.content: House seems to be [Futura Extra Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526121937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/extra-black/testdrive.html?s=HoUSe&p=48). I can't seem to read the revenge font.
